entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Iran's deputy health minister tests positive for coronavirus a day after playing down outbreak fears
entity.description: During a televised press conference in Tehran on Monday, Iraj Harirchi was seen coughing and sweating while he assured the public that the coronavirus "situation is almost stable in the country." The Iranian deputy health minister, who is in charge of containing the spread of the pathogen, confirmed he tested positive for the virus the following day and is now under quarantine. The Islamic republic is currently amid a major outbreak with 15 dead, the largest outside of China.

text: @nytimes It’s like the Iranian Health Minister telling the people of Iran that there was no Coronavirus there, while the guy standing next to him was obviously sick and sweating with fever.
